description.p: +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls, proficiency with shortbows provides proficiency with this bow
While attuned you can perform the following actions once:
Stealth. Using the bow you can cast pass without trace

Marked for the hunt. As a bonus action you can mark a creature you can see and specify a damage type. The creature has vulnerability to that damage type until it next takes damage. This vulnerability negates any resistances or immunities to that damage type that the creature might normally have
